title: Embarrassing excuse for a horror film
review: This movie is completely incoherent, poorly directed, edited, and acted. Has a confusing plot, leaves too many questions unanswered, and is utterly non-scary. A low budget is no excuse for lazy writing and shoddy execution. One of the worst films I have ever seen. Do not waste your time with it.

title: The script and dialogue writers should just do the world a favour by cutting off their writing arm.
review:
I'm not going to use bad language(although that's what should be used).
The script and dialogue writers should just do the world a favour by cutting off their writing arm.
I mean seriously, what the hell?
Your money and effort may not be precious, but our time is............................
So next time you think of writing, just don't.

title: Who's baby even is it?
review:
Wow! Not a good wow either!
Scenes start and end abruptly, the acting is nothing short of shocking (*see "nobody messes with my baby)
And for crying out loud... Who the hell does the baby belong to and why is it always in bed?
Dreadful film.
